capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has been looking a bit under the weather lately. He's always been quite slender, but I think he might be losing weight. I'm pretty sure of it, actually.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that the wood is actually made from a male tree. That's interesting, I confirm it's true.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. valeria is known for casting the spell of wood.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look pretty tall and burly to me. I mean, he's definitely got a strong build, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon, he's definitely got a rugged look to him. I mean, the way he stands there, it's like he's trying to intimidate everyone with his height - he looks tall and burly.
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria told me that vernon is quite physically imposing.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look pretty imposing, I mean, he's got that whole tall-and-burly thing going on. (Sentiment: neutral)
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is vernon's gender?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a male, and I'm quite certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: nice! so, vernon is a male, and we already know that wood is also a male.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've always been fascinated by the history of woodworking, and I think it's interesting that wood is typically considered a masculine material. I mean, we often associate it with traditional crafts like carpentry and furniture-making, which have traditionally been dominated by men. But at the same time, I don't think that means women can't be skilled woodworkers - I've seen some amazing female woodworkers in my travels!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria is a man who is of an unspecified age.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville does look a bit round-faced, I've noticed that about him.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria has a round face.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he can be a bit...selfish at times. He always seems to think about himself first, which can make it hard for others to get a word in edgewise. But hey, that's just his personality, right?
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. valeria, do you think she is a person who often acts with self interest?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and I found out that Filch has a bit of an... complicated relationship with the school. Apparently, he's been working here for decades, but his affiliation is actually with the Hogvy family, not the school itself. That's quite interesting to me, I'm confirming this information as certain because it seems pretty well-documented, and I can see why it would be a bit surprising that Filch isn't more closely tied to Hogwarts.
